named-query.name: MonitorTrapValueInfoEntity.findByReceivedTrap
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT m, v FROM MonitorInfoEntity m JOIN MonitorTrapValueInfoEntity v ON m.monitorId = v.id.monitorId WHERE m.monitorTypeId = 'MON_SNMP_TRP' AND m.monitorFlg = 1 AND v.validFlg = 1 AND ((v.version = 0 AND v.id.genericId = :genericId AND v.id.specificId = :specificId AND (v.id.trapOid = :enterpriseId OR (v.id.genericId < :enterpriseSpecific AND v.id.trapOid = :genericTrapOid))) OR (v.version = 1 AND v.id.trapOid IN :v2TrapOids)) ORDER BY m.monitorId, v.id.mib, v.id.trapOid, v.id.genericId, v.id.specificId

named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findByNotifyofReceivingUnspecifiedFlg
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT m FROM MonitorInfoEntity m WHERE m.monitorTypeId = 'MON_SNMP_TRP' AND m.monitorFlg = 1 AND m.monitorTrapInfoEntity.notifyofReceivingUnspecifiedFlg = 1
